name: places/ChIJgS0kvA1bwokRhinQyB7vWTA
adrFormatAddress: 60 Furman St, Brooklyn, NY 11201, USA

originalText.text:
Best salon experience, ever! Im a Black woman so it’s super hard finding a reliable and trustworthy/stylist/salon. I worked with Adriana and from our consultation to the day of the appointment she was helpful and knowledgeable about the process, the upkeep and a schedule for maintenance. I felt so comfortable in the salon and it’s apparent they put the customer’s experience first. I am so happy with my hair and excited to see how my hair will thrive here. Even a week later the integrity of my hair has still maintained. Will definitely be back!
(4c hair- relaxer- trim- blow dry and flat iron)

originalText.text: Jennifer is now my go-to girl for my hair when I’m in NYC. I’m very particular how to do my haircut and she instantly know and got how my hair should be done and I’m very happy how it turned out. She listened very carefully and made sure she delivered. Thank you so much Jennifer, you’re my hair stylist now in NYC (I’m very loyal as you know, one hairstylist in Toronto & one hairstylist in NYC). Keep it up! You’re doing amazing.  Will see you again when I’m back :)

originalText.text:
Diamond has been my stylist for 3 years and I’m not seeing anyone else ever. I’ve been going to salon718 since I was in high school. They did my hair for prom. After religiously seeing one stylist (who no longer works there) for 6+ years… I am honestly so happy to now have Diamond. They are my favorite stylist yet. I love the feeling of walking in and being able to say with confidence “do whatever you want” because I know Diamond always nails my cut and style/blow out. There’s nothing better than not having any haircut anxiety, because you know that you are in good hands.

Her new assistant Kelly-Ann is the perfect coupling to Diamonds talent. I so appreciate their energy and love chatting like I’m kicking it with my friends at home getting ready to go out.

Diamonds work was recently featured in Vouge and I know it’s only the beginning of their success and recognition. She has a decade of experience and can do any cut, style, length or texture… I trust her completely.

Let her take care of you! I promise you’ll book her again

originalText.text: Had another amazing appointment with Diamond and Kelly-Ann today! Super kind and funny and gave me great advice for my first gloss which turned out AMAZING. My blowout looks great too, always happy to go to an appointment at Salon 718.

text.text: Had another amazing appointment with Diamond and Kelly-Ann today! Super kind and funny and gave me great advice for my first gloss which turned out AMAZING. My blowout looks great too, always happy to go to an appointment at Salon 718.

originalText.text: I had such an amazing first experience here today. I called this morning for a simple trim of my bangs and they were easily able to accommodate and fit me in. Lauren did a wonderful job and perfectly executed the look I was going for! All the other stylists in the salon were so sweet and complimentary. I will definitely be back!
